description: There are hundreds of cocktails to choose from. You can get tried-and-tested classic cocktails like a&nbsp;margarita, mojito, manhanttan, moscow mule and daiquiri or opt for a cold brew coffee based cocktail. The choices are simply endless. If you are looking to expand your cocktail-making experience for yourself and your friends, add this blackberry basil smash recipe to your list.
keywords: how to make blackberry basil smash
name: Blackberry Basil Smash

recipeInstructions.name: First step is to muddle the blackberries and basil in a shaker. (Don't have a muddler? You can get our copper plated cocktail muddler.)  Muddle until you smell the blackberry and basil.

recipeInstructions.name: Next step is to combine all the liquid ingredients - lime juice, simple syrup and vodka into the shaker. Then, add ice and shake.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour all the contents directly into your glass (you don't need to use a strainer). Garnish your creation with blackberries and basil leaf, and you are done!
